title: Coronavirus: Peru limits movement by gender to stem spread
description: Men and women are allowed out on different days, while on Sunday everyone must stay at home.
content:
Image copyrightGetty ImagesImage caption
 The police and armed forces will be enforcing the new measures
Peru has begun enforcing strict new measures to stop the spread of the coronavirus disease, restricting public movement by gender.
